TopicTitle: Kethane Pack 0.9.2 - New cinematic trailer! - 1.0 compatibility update

Articles.Content:
I never realized that there was a 0.4.3, so I finally updated today because 0.4.2 does not work in KSP 0.20.

However, I am now having difficulties. Whenever I put a detector (either) on a ship (of any size) and launch, it warps the map out to the middle of space and does not load the craft, but just freezes there with the "moving really fast in orbit whooshing" sound. I can attach any other pieces (drills, tanks, etc) and they work fine. Any advice on fixing this?

Also, to fix the scaling issue, just go through all the part configs and if they do not already have the parameter "scale" just "scale = 1" right under the "rescale = ..." line.
Yeah, I'm having the same problem.

Yeah, I'm having the same problem.

yeah, me Three

I have this problem too with detectors and the drills :S

The German KSP community page has an updated DLL you can use in the meantime (which per the posts below does not work, so nvm it).

Source: http://kerbalspaceprogram.de/mods-und-addons/209-kethane-update/

Edited May 24, 2013 by Luckz

I am also having the same problem as listed above. Unfortunately the DLL download from the German KSP community doesn't work for me.

It just replaces the old Plugin file correct?

The German KSP community page has ....

How do you apply it? I overwrote my current dll located in the Plugins folder and when I launched the game I was still not able to launch any crafts equipped with scanners. Exactly the same issue.

I'm also not having any luck with the link from the German forum. I just replaced the original kethane DLL with the one from the link provided and still cannot launch or access anything with scanners. Are there any steps I'm missing, or has anyone else found a way to get this working? Cheers!

Edited May 23, 2013 by Minions

kethane 0.4.3 is for KSP 0.19.1, not 0.20

I don't think it will load/work proper until its updated to work with ksp 0.20 file system...

I got these cheezeburgurs man!
I guess Kethane has addictive propeties to humans. I can feel the withdrawal effects from playing ksp without kethane.

So i lost a crap ton of flights/stations-over 280 hours of playtime.So im starting over..again.. And i deleted ALL MODS,To start fresh with .20.Wondering if anyone is fixing KETHANE for .20 . Its one of the few mods that I i feel make KSP that much better.Im sure plenty of others feel same way.So im wondering if anyone of even the guy that took over kethane is going to revamp its awesomesauce for us?Maybe throw in a couple resized drills.maybe a radial tank too,instead of the long skinny radial.maybe ones that can go with claire's radial tanks she created with KSPX,but green of course .Anyway, i really hope kethane comes back for .20 .~the dude abides, the dude abides.

I posted this is requests.guess ill slap a quote on it here.In hopes its gets revamped.

It's been less than a day, calm down a bit. Kethane is nowhere near abandoned. Keep on using your .19 save for a little while longer if it's that big a deal for you, or stick to going to places you can go to without relying on Kethane.

everyone is calm man, Just putting in our requests.Letting the mod makers know we love their stuff.And hope they are still working on it.No one is raging or anything of the likes. Just like almost every other mod thread on this forum.
